# Overall Check Summary

[Insert overall check summary information here]


```{r generate_section_headings, echo = FALSE}
datasetNames <- names(params$checkDataset$criticalChecks)
for(datasetName in datasetNames){
cat(paste0("# ", datasetName, "\n"))

  cat(paste0("## Summary", "\n"))

    
  cat(paste0("## Critical Checks", "\n"))
    print(params$checkDataset$criticalChecks[datasetName])
      
  cat(paste0("## Non-Critical Checks", "\n"))
    print(params$checkDataset$nonCriticalChecks[datasetName])
}
```
